mapper.select: select r.data_id,r.data_file,r.company_code,r.type from data_center_relation r where r.data_id = #{dataId};
mapper.update: update data_center_relation set file_status = #{fileStatus} where data_id = #{dataId} and type = #{type}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO data_center_relation ( data_id, company_code, type, file_status, member_id, time, create_date, update_date, data_file, method_code, fail_times, source_key, prg_id ) VALUES ( #{dataId}, #{companyCode}, #{type}, #{fileStatus}, #{memberId}, #{time}, now(), now(), #{dataFile,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, #{methodCode}, 0, #{sourceKey}, #{prgId} )
